message: Let's split almost evenly, Bob, with me getting a bit more to start.  It's only fair considering the money loses value each round.
I think we should split the money more evenly,  with me getting slightly more to compensate for the shrinking value. Let's work together to make sure we both get a fair share.
Bob, let's be realistic. We're running out of time and losing money. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
